channel.title: Kicking out from the server
channel.description:
hello idont know if it the internet connection or something but i portforward my server 43594 and 43594 and tcp and my friends join but on the cmd of the server it say suspicious activity and it kick him from the server like if it was a connection lost? how can i fix the problem?
[client-2-Dartz]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 1 ms] [client-2-Dartz]: Suspicious activity! ClientHandler: Client Dartz disconnected (--------------) Connection from adsl-------------.net:51786 [client-2-Dartz]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 1 ms] Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Dartz. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 63762 at client.dropItem(client.java:8875) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15665) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17084) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:268) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Kicking out from the server
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69

find the line suspicious activity and post the method its in
